      • _Log

        private void _Log(java.lang.String msg,
                  TLogger.ELevel lv,
                  java.lang.Object source,
                  java.lang.String method)
        Writes a log entry. Depending on the log target, the message will either be written to a log file or to stdout/stderr.
        Parameters:
        msg - The message to log
        lv - The log level
        source - Name of the class from which the log entry originates.
        method - Name of the method from which the log entry originates.
